articles.title: Are you among the 1 in 5 Americans with long COVID? Here’s what you need to know about how brain-foggy—and potentially dangerous—it is - Fortune
articles.description: Experts are developing a better understanding of long COVID, including what it does to your energy levels, cognition, and even if it can be deadly.
